name: n8n Trigger
semantic_context: Handle events and perform actions on your n8n instance
natural_language_description: 这是 n8n Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle events and perform actions on your n8n instance

events.name: events
events.description: Specifies under which conditions an execution should happen: 				 					**Published Workflow Updated**: Triggers when workflow version is published from a published state (workflow was already published) 					**Instance Started**:  Triggers when this n8n instance is started or re-started 					**Workflow Published**: Triggers when workflow version is published from an unpublished state (workflow was unpublished)
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: Specifies under which conditions an execution should happen: 				 					**Published Workflow Updated**: Triggers when workflow version is published from a published state (workflow was already published) 					**Instance Started**:  Triggers when this n8n instance is started or re-started 					**Workflow Published**: Triggers when workflow version is published from an unpublished state (workflow was unpublished) | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: Published Workflow Updated (值: update) - Triggers when workflow version is published from a published state (workflow was already published)
Instance Started (值: init) - Triggers when this n8n instance is started or re-started
Workflow Published (值: activate) - Triggers when workflow version is published from an unpublished state (workflow was not published)
